column4: hello all. IS this the best place to ask samba related ubuntu questions?
depends on the wuestion. samba is very well documented. :)  and often the best place is the samba docs.

for some odd reason in the past with the gnome file manager ive had to enter the full url/path to a share on the samba server then it would ask for my user/password. THEN it would start seeing it right. Not sure why it does it and some times not
ie  In the file manager address bar -> smb://server/storage1/
